cast.overview: The men who made millions from a global economic meltdown.
cast.title: The Big Short

cast.overview: A young girl is raised in a dysfunctional family constantly on the run from the FBI. Living in poverty, she comes of age guided by her drunkard, ingenious father who distracts her with magical stories to keep her mind off the family's dire state, and her selfish, nonconformist mother who has no intention of raising a family, along with her younger brother and sister, and her other older sister. Together, they fend for each other as they mature in an unorthodox journey that is their family life.
cast.title: The Glass Castle

cast.overview: A newly-released prison gangster is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.
cast.title: Shot Caller

cast.overview: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
cast.title: Promising Young Woman

cast.overview: World famous movie star Olivia faces a PR disaster when a paparazzi snaps a photo of her with her married lover, Vincent. The hard-working valet Antonio accidentally appears in the same photo and is enlisted to pose as Olivia’s new boyfriend as a cover-up. This ruse with Olivia thrusts Antonio into the spotlight and unexpected chaos.
cast.title: The Valet

details.biography:
Max Greenfield (born September 4, 1979) is an American actor and comedian. He is best known for his role as Dave Johnson on the CBS sitcom The Neighborhood, and as Schmidt on the Fox sitcom New Girl, the latter for which he received nominations at the Primetime Emmy Awards, the Golden Globe Awards, and the Critics' Choice Television Awards.  His films include Promising Young Woman, What Men Want, The Glass Castle, The Big Short, About Alex, and They Came Together.

He had recurring roles on Veronica Mars, American Crime Story, American Horror Story, The Mindy Project, Raising the Bar, Ugly Betty, Greek, and Modern Men. He also guest starred on a number of TV shows.

He has voiced characters on Hoops, Bob's Burgers, Bojack Horseman, and Robot Chicken.
details.name: Max Greenfield
